mainBoard.name: Soulshriek
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature you control gets +*/+0 until end of turn, where * is equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Bury that creature at end of turn.
mainBoard.text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

mainBoard.flavorText: Good help is hard to dig up.

foreignData.name: Flaches Grab
foreignData.text: Bringe die oberste Kreaturenkarte aus Deinem Friedhof direkt ins Spiel, als ob sie gerade gesprochen worden wäre. Für diese Kreatur gilt die Einsatzverzögerung nicht. Entferne diese Kreatur am Ende des Zuges ganz aus dem Spiel.

mainBoard.name: Shallow Grave
mainBoard.originalText: Put the top creature card from your graveyard into play as though it were just played. That creature is unaffected by summoning sickness. Remove the creature from the game at end of any turn.

rulings.text: Only exiles the creature if the creature is still on the battlefield at the beginning of the end step.

mainBoard.text: Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: The payment of 3 life is an additional cost of casting the spell.
A “creature spell” is any spell with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact or Enchantment. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature spells.

mainBoard.name: Nocturnal Raid
mainBoard.originalText: All black creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: On resolution, all black creatures on the battlefield get the bonus. Ones that enter the battlefield later in the turn do not get it.

mainBoard.text: Black creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

foreignData.name: Dunkler Sog
foreignData.text: Der Dunkle Sog fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl pro {B}, das Du zusätzlich zu den Spruchkosten bezahlst, 1 Schadenspunkt zu. Du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt für jeden Schadenspunkt, der auf diese Art zugefügt wird, dazu. Du kannst nicht mehr Lebenspunkte, als die Widerstandskraft der Kreatur beträgt, oder als die Anzahl der Lebenspunkte des Spielers, dem mit dem Dunklen Sog Schaden zugefügt wurde, dazu erhalten.

mainBoard.name: Drain Life
mainBoard.originalText: For each oB you spend in addition to the casting cost, Drain Life deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Gain 1 life for each 1 damage dealt, but not more than the toughness of the creature or the life total of the player Drain Life damages.

rulings.text: Cost reducers can be used to reduce the X part of the mana cost.
You may gain up to the total toughness of the creature even if it was already damaged.

mainBoard.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.
